headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Prize Ride: Pegassi Zentorno
content:
Beating out your fellow street racers and the LSPDâ€™s squad cars to place Top 3 in the Pursuit Series for five days in a row will land you the Pegassi Zentorno, a Los Santos classic that will give both you and the rubberneckers whiplash.

To unlock access to the LS Car Meet, head over to see Mimi in Cypress Flats. You can find her location by locating the LS Car Meet icon on the GTA Online Map.
